Français

APIUS.py

October 25-26 2013

Subscribe!

You don’t want to miss it!

Welcome scientists, developers, students, the passionate and/or the deadly curious, to the first Python meetup in Sherbrooke! How would you like to meet enthusiasts of all kinds, to build a professional or friendly contact web to find an internship, a potential job – or an intern/potential employee – or to simply hangout with awesome people? APIUS.py is the happening where you want to be in October 2013!

Listen to amazing speakers and interact with a group of dynamic people to discuss technology and increase your knowledge of the Python programming language. An introductory session will be provided to help everyone getting the basics, before moving to more advanced subjects.

You’ll get the chance to contribute to Sherbrooke’s technological scene, in a friendly atmosphere that made the success of last APIUS 2013. Food and beverage will be offered for free. We’re looking forward to meeting you!

... and it's totally free!

Organizers

You like helping by taking important responsibilities and critical decisions? You have some time to dedicate to a project such as APIUS?

Join the organizer team by contacting us and receive a fantastic t-shirt! ♥

Volunteer

You would like to engage in a nice large-scale project, meet influent people, but you have limited time to dedicate to it? Help us by volunteering and you will receive, just as for organizers, a fantastic APIUS t-shirt! ♥

Tell us of your interest by contacting us.

Speakers

If you would die to talk about a subject that you are enthusiast about, related to Python, if you love spreading your knowledge about technology, you could live a vertiginous and gratifying experience by becoming one of our speakers.

Contact us to let us know your interest or ideas!

♥ from the APIUS team

Contact : info@apius.ca
